amendment.description: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 115-679 to establish a pilot program to demonstrate effective tools and techniques for safeguarding national forests and watersheds.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 115-679 to establish a pilot program to demonstrate effective tools and techniques for safeguarding national forests and watersheds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A039) offered by Mr. Pearce.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pearce amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
